title: Overfitting & Underfitting
subject: Machine Learning
theory:
- **Underfitting (High Bias)**: Model is too simple. Matches nothing. (Linear line on curved data).
- **Overfitting (High Variance)**: Model is too complex. Memorizes noise. (Connects every dot). Good Train score, Bad Test score.

interview_questions.question: How to fix Overfitting?
interview_questions.answer: More Data, Simplify Model, Regularization, Cross-Validation.
